nodes.text: The Spine Dragon of M'dweshuu was a spine dragon who was killed by the Jedi Padawan Ki Sazen during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. Sazen killed the dragon on the planet Tas-La, and after defeating it a cult made up of members of the Nikto species formed around her because of the deed. M'dweshuu was a nova located in Hutt Space.

The Spine Dragon of M'dweshuu was first mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic, an MMORPG released in 2011 by BioWare. The dragon was mentioned in the quest "The Cult of Ki Sazen" which took place on the planet Taris and was for players of the Imperial Agent class.
